indicator_name: Proportion and number of children aged 5‑17 years engaged in child labour, by sex and age
target: Take immediate and effective measures to eradicate forced labour, end modern slavery and human trafficking and secure the prohibition and elimination of the worst forms of child labour, including recruitment and use of child soldiers, and by 2025 end child labour in all its forms
title: Untitled
national_indicator_available: .a Proportion of children aged 5-17 years engaged in child labour, by sex and age groups
computation_calculations: Number of children aged 5-17 years old engaged in child labour out of the total number of children 5-17 years old (including 5-14 and 15-17 years old), in percentage.
graph_title: 8.7.1.a.  Proportion of children aged 5-17 years engaged in child labour, by sex and age groups
source_responsible_monitoring_1: Ministry of Health, Labour and Social Protection
